title: Module Positions
_comment: put this content at the bottom of list of config controls

items.onChange: (evt, node) => {  var selection=$(evt.target).val(); let v=$(evt.target).attr('id'); var id=v.split('.').slice(-1);let prefix=v.split('-').slice(0,-1).join('-'); var module_name = node.el.parentElement.firstChild.firstChild.firstChild.getAttribute('value'); let idtofind=prefix+'-'+module_name+'.'+id; let input=document.getElementById(idtofind); input.value=selection}

items.description: position order in MagicMirror region, 1 is 1st, 2 is second, and so on, * is don't care
items.onChange: (evt, node) => {  var selection=$(evt.target).val(); let v=$(evt.target).attr('id'); var id=v.split('.').slice(-1);let prefix=v.split('-').slice(0,-1).join('-'); var module_name = node.el.parentElement.firstChild.firstChild.firstChild.getAttribute('value'); let idtofind=prefix+'-'+module_name+'.'+id; let input=document.getElementById(idtofind); input.value=selection}
